verses.verse: And Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Bela <S%H1106><s%> his first-born, Ashbel <S%H788><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> Aharah <S%H315><s%> the third, <S%H7992><s%>
Nohah <S%H5119><s%> the fourth, <S%H7243><s%> and Rapha <S%H7498><s%> the fifth. <S%H2549><s%>
And Bela <S%H1106><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> sons: <S%H1121><s%> Addar, <S%H146><s%> Gera, <S%H1617><s%> Abihud, <S%H31><s%>
Abishua, <S%H50><s%> Naaman, <S%H5283><s%> Ahoah, <S%H265><s%>
Gera, <S%H1617><s%> Shephuphan, <S%H9625><s%> and Huram. <S%H2361><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ehud: <S%H261><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households] of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Geba, <S%H1387><s%> and they carried <S%H1540><s%> them into exile <S%H1540><s%> to Manahath, <S%H9273><s%>

namely, Naaman, <S%H5283><s%> Ahijah, <S%H281><s%> and Gera <S%H1617><s%> â€“ he carried <S%H1540><s%> them into exile; <S%H1540><s%> and he became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Uzza <S%H5798><s%> and Ahihud. <S%H284><s%>

And Shaharaim <S%H7842><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of children in the country <S%H7704><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> after <S%H4480><s%> he had sent <S%H7971><s%> away <S%H7971><s%> Hushim <S%H2366><s%> and Baara <S%H1199><s%> his wives. <S%H802><s%>
And by Hodesh <S%H2321><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> he became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jobab, <S%H3103><s%> Zibia, <S%H6644><s%> Mesha, <S%H4331><s%> Malcam, <S%H9266><s%>
Jeuz, <S%H3263><s%> Sachia, <S%H9600><s%> Mirmah. <S%H4821><s%> These <S%H428><s%> were his sons, <S%H1121><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households.]
And by Hushim <S%H2366><s%> he became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Abitub <S%H36><s%> and Elpaal. <S%H508><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elpaal <S%H508><s%> [were] Eber, <S%H5677><s%> Misham, <S%H4936><s%> and Shemed, <S%H9612><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Ono <S%H207><s%> and Lod, <S%H3850><s%> with its towns; <S%H1323><s%>

and Beriah <S%H1283><s%> and Shema, <S%H8087><s%> who <S%H1992><s%> were heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households] of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Aijalon, <S%H357><s%> who <S%H1992><s%> put <S%H1272><s%> to flight <S%H1272><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gath; <S%H1661><s%>
and Ahio, <S%H283><s%> Shashak, <S%H8349><s%> and Jeremoth. <S%H3406><s%>
And Zebadiah, <S%H2069><s%> Arad, <S%H9436><s%> Eder, <S%H5738><s%>
Michael, <S%H4317><s%> Ishpah, <S%H3472><s%> and Joha <S%H3109><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah. <S%H1283><s%>
And Zebadiah, <S%H2069><s%> Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> Hizki, <S%H2395><s%> Heber, <S%H2268><s%>
Ishmerai, <S%H3461><s%> Izliah, <S%H3152><s%> and Jobab <S%H3103><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elpaal. <S%H508><s%>
And Jakim, <S%H3356><s%> Zichri, <S%H2147><s%> Zabdi, <S%H2067><s%>
Elienai, <S%H462><s%> Zillethai, <S%H6769><s%> Eliel, <S%H447><s%>
Adaiah, <S%H5718><s%> Beraiah, <S%H1256><s%> and Shimrath <S%H8119><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shimei. <S%H8096><s%>
And Ishpan, <S%H3473><s%> Eber, <S%H5677><s%> Eliel, <S%H447><s%>
Abdon, <S%H5658><s%> Zichri, <S%H2147><s%> Hanan, <S%H2605><s%>
Hananiah, <S%H2608><s%> Elam, <S%H9405><s%> Anthothijah, <S%H6070><s%>
Iphdeiah, <S%H3301><s%> and Penuel <S%H6439><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shashak. <S%H8349><s%>
And Shamsherai, <S%H8125><s%> Shehariah, <S%H7841><s%> Athaliah, <S%H6271><s%>
Jaareshiah, <S%H3298><s%> Elijah, <S%H452><s%> and Zichri <S%H2147><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham. <S%H3395><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers' [households] according to their generations, <S%H8435><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> men, <S%H7218><s%> who <S%H428><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
Now in Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> [Jeiel,] the father of Gibeon <S%H1><s%> lived, <S%H1391><s%> and his wife's name <S%H3427><s%> was Maacah; <S%H8034><s%>
and his first-born son <S%H1121><s%> [was] Abdon, <S%H5658><s%> then Zur, <S%H6698><s%> Kish, <S%H7027><s%> Baal, <S%H9058><s%> Nadab, <S%H5070><s%>
Gedor, <S%H1446><s%> Ahio, <S%H283><s%> and Zecher. <S%H2144><s%>

And Mikloth <S%H4732><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shimeah. <S%H8039><s%> And they also <S%H637><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> with their relatives <S%H251><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> opposite <S%H5048><s%> their [other] relatives. <S%H251><s%>

And Ner <S%H5369><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Kish, <S%H7027><s%> and Kish <S%H7027><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> Malchi-shua, Abinadab, <S%H41><s%> and Eshbaal. <S%H792><s%>
And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> [was] Merib-baal, and Merib-baal became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Micah. <S%H4318><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Micah <S%H4318><s%> [were] Pithon, <S%H6377><s%> Melech, <S%H4429><s%> Tarea, <S%H8390><s%> and Ahaz. <S%H271><s%>

And Ahaz <S%H271><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jehoaddah, <S%H3085><s%> and Jehoaddah <S%H3085><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Alemeth, <S%H5964><s%> Azmaveth, <S%H5820><s%> and Zimri; <S%H2174><s%> and Zimri <S%H2174><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Moza. <S%H4162><s%>

And Moza <S%H4162><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Binea; <S%H1150><s%> Raphah <S%H9572><s%> [was] his son, <S%H1121><s%> Eleasah <S%H501><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Azel <S%H682><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Azel <S%H682><s%> had six <S%H8337><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> [were] their names: <S%H8034><s%> Azrikam, <S%H5840><s%> Bocheru, <S%H1074><s%> Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> Sheariah, <S%H8187><s%> Obadiah <S%H5662><s%> and Hanan. <S%H2605><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azel. <S%H682><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eshek <S%H6232><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> [were] Ulam <S%H198><s%> his first-born, Jeush <S%H3266><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> and Eliphelet <S%H467><s%> the third. <S%H7992><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ulam <S%H198><s%> were mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> archers, <S%H1869><s%> <S%H7198><s%> and had <S%H7235><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and grandsons, <S%H1121><s%> 150 [of them.] All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>
